features: 96 Sheets Watercolor Stationery Paper: This set of decorative paper can be used to add a personal touch to your craft projects, party or wedding invitations, or greeting cards
Multi-Purpose: The decorative paper can easily be customized with pens, markers, stamps, or paint, allowing you to create unique and personalized messages or invitations for your friends and family
Printer-Friendly: Each letter-size paper sheet measures approximately 8.5 x 11 inches and is compatible with both inkjet and laser printers, making it convenient for printing at home or in the office

Reliable Quality: Made from 100gsm paper, each sheet features double-sided pastel watercolors, providing ample space to add text, pictures, and drawings for scrapbooking. The paper is sturdy and reliable, ensuring that your creative work will last

What's Included: The package contains 96 sheets of fancy paper in 12 colorful designs, giving you plenty of options to choose from for your next DIY design project or scrapbooking event. With this colored pastel printer paper set, unleash your creativity and bring your ideas to life on high-quality watercolor stationery paper

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Be Expressive Our world is full of distinct colors and moments of inspiration. We focus on creativity, being expressive on paper and in life.

Colorful Watercolor Stationery Paper Our set of colorful double-sided stationery paper features 12 pastel watercolor designs. Use the sheets of paper to write letters, create custom party invitations, thank you notes, or informational pages. Letter-size: 8.5 x 11 inches

Watercolor Designs You can add a decorative personal touch to your handwritten letters, event invitations, school projects, scrapbooking pages, and save the dates. Personalize Embellish these sheets of pastel paper with fun stickers, drawings, stamps, cutouts, and tape! For Any Occassion These watercolor sheets of paper are ideal for events such as birthday parties, baby showers, graduations, weddings, engagement parties, and Valentines.
Never Stop Dreaming Write down your dreams, record your intentions, and make life an artful craft with our aesthetic stationery items and office supplies.

Watercolor Stationery Paper, Letter Size (8.5 x 11 in, 96 Sheets) 48 Pack Leaf Themed Stationery Writing Paper Set, Letter Size (8.5 x 11 In) Vintage Stationery Paper and Envelopes for Invitation (8.5 x 11 In, 48 Pack) Rustic Wood Stationery Paper, Letter Size (8.5 x 11 in, 96 Sheets) Floral Vintage Stationery Letter Paper and Envelopes Set (90 Pieces) QTY 96 Sheets 48 Sheets 48 Sheets / 48 Envelopes 96 Sheets 60 Sheets / 30 Envelopes

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars THEY ARE WATERPROOF TOO!!!
reviews.reviewText: This product came up as I was searching for water-PROOF paper. It it didn't legitimately apply to what I was truly looking for, as nowhere in the product description does it even mention "waterproof". However I didn't notice. I was excited that print & copy friendly was mentioned, & how pretty it looked. It was also MUCH LESS EXPENSIVE than the alternative waterproof paper and spiral notebooks I viewed & bought at the same time. I needed the best, most versatile writing materials for my upcoming outdoor purpose, so I bought 5 different types of waterproof paper, then tested ~10 writing instruments (pencil, pen, felt pens, Sharpies, etc.) on each. I ran water over everything and compared the results. Still not realizing these sheets were NOT specifically marketed as "waterproof", they were by far the most superior!!! (only gel pens, felt pens & some highlighters didn't hold up under water) Only when I went to purchase MORE, check for other colors etc, did I finally realized these water-COLOR sheets had no mention of also being water-PROOF. THEY ARE TRULY AMAZING, BEAUTIFUL, VERSATILE AND HIGH QUALITY. Don't hesitate--- buy them!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pretty paper that is the perfect weight
reviews.reviewText: I love this paper! We use it to make labels/wraps for our handmade soaps. I love the variety of colors, the weight, and the finish of the paper.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The paper is beautiful
reviews.reviewText: The watercolor shows on both sides. Which makes running it through a printer really easy. You do not have to worry about it you have the paper facing the right direction. There were no issues running through our printer. Never jammed. Did not bleed through to the other side. The ink dried quickly and well on the paper. The paper is a good quality. it was used to help create teacher appreciation gifts. We made inspiration jars for 10 teachers and printed out 7 sheets for each jar. There was such a range of colors and patterns, it worked really well. The rainbow of colors inside the jar was exactly what we were needing and going for!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Used this paper to send out invitations that I printed out. Love the color variations in the paper. Just really pretty.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good quality paper
reviews.reviewText: The color choices are great. Paper quality is good. Not too think or thin, but just right for crafts, certificates, etc.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 25, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very pretty but very light weight
reviews.reviewText: Loved the colors but would have like the paper used to have a heavier weight.Update-I thought the paper feeling so lightweight would allow glitter pens to bleed through- ABSOLUTELY NOTHING!Very Very happy with this paper! I am using to make bookmarks & working out perfectly!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful colors, two-sided!
reviews.reviewText: This paper was for a piano recital program, and it printed up beautifully, with the two-sided color. The quality was good, not a thin paper. Kudos.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Have ordered this paper 3 times. I use it with colorful envelopes in the same hue. Makes nice business letters we send out. It is not lightweight.
This paper is beautiful and heavier than your average printer paper. I think I will be able to write on both sides!
Justo lo que buscaba para trabajar. El grosor es normal como una hoja blanca cualquiera no es opalina.

This paper was exactly what I wanted and also was nice and thick so it is well worth the money. The shipping was way faster than the expected date even though we are dealing with "shipping delays". I'm so happy with my order!
Valen la pena, son diseños de diferentes colores y muy hermosas

reviews.reviewTitle: Just dont use it for stationary unless you gave a lighted desk to see a lined sheet through it!
reviews.reviewText: Its beautiful paper theres no question there but it's so heavy you cant see a lined sheet through it to make wiring letters easier tou would need a lighted desk in order to see a lined page through thus paper otherwise its beautiful and very good quality.
